detaileddescription.para: Returns the variable that was added to this drop box.

simplesect.para: Variable that was added to this widget or null, if the drop box is empty.

detaileddescription.para: Adds the variable to this drop box. The widget can be cleaned by passing null argument to this method.

parameterdescription.para: Variable to be added or null to clean the drop box.

detaileddescription.para: Returns hint text. The hint text is shown if there is no variable in this drop box.

simplesect.para: Hint text that is shown in empty drop box.

detaileddescription.para: Sets hint text. The hint text is shown if there is no variable in this drop box.

parameterdescription.para: Hint text to be show in empty drop box.

detaileddescription.para: Returns the droppable state of this view. If the view is not droppable, the drop event is ignored.

simplesect.para: True if this view is droppable, false otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Sets the droppable state of this view. If the view is not droppable, the drop event is ignored.

parameterdescription.para: True if this view is droppable, false otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Registers a callback to be invoked when a variable is dropped.

parameterdescription.para: The callback that will be executed.

detaileddescription.para: Registers a callback to be invoked when a variable is cleared. The variable is cleared when the user presses the clear button.

parameterdescription.para: The callback that will be executed.

detaileddescription.para: Registers a callback to be invoked when a variable is clicked.

parameterdescription.para: The callback that will be executed.

detaileddescription.para: A widget that allows to drop a variable withing its boundaries. Such variable is than visualized and its reference can be retrieved from this widget. The variable may be removed from the widget by clicking the clear (cross) button. This widget also allows to add or remove a variable programmatically.
